snippet: Nigeria beat Mexico, 3-0, in the Under-17 World Cup final in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, winning the tournament for a record fourth time.
abstract: Nigeria beats Mexico, 3-0, in the Under-17 World Cup soccer final in Abu Dhabi.
lead_paragraph: Nigeria beat Mexico, 3-0, in the Under-17 World Cup final in Abu Dhabi, United Arab Emirates, winning the tournament for a record fourth time.

headline.main: Fourth Under-17 World Cup Title for Nigeria
